#summary Information about instalation

To install ISO8583 Python library is a piece of cake :)

1) [http://code.google.com/p/iso8583py/downloads/list Download the package]

2) Un-compress it

3) Go to the folder where setup.py is

4) Install with the command: "python setup.py install"

5) That's it!

6) Enjoy, read, learn the examples in the "ExamplesPage" directory.

You can install using [http://peak.telecommunity.com/DevCenter/EasyInstall easy-install] on the [http://pypi.python.org/pypi/ISO8583%20Module/1.0 Python Package Index].
 
Or you can found the source at http://code.google.com/p/iso8583py/source/checkout
